section.name: Known Bugs for Teolenn @@@VERSION@@@
section.p: Teolenn is not able to designing probes for genome sequence files with more than 500 scaffolds due to a limitation with the specificity calculation using genome tools.

section.name: Submit a Teolenn bug
section.p: You can submit a bug by filling an entry on the issue tracker of the Google code hosting page of our project.
